name: Bowling Bonanza 3D
description:
For both the casual and the serious
gamer Bowling Bonanza boasts full
3D rigid body physics. Create any
kind of shot by adjusting your stance,
direction or ball spin or for the more
serious, position the ball and shape
the shot as required

So whether you want a simple easy
and fun bowling game or a full on
simulation this game is for you!

Choose from Quick Play, Arcade,
league and tournament game modes

Multiplayer hot seat up to 4 players

CPU opponents have 5 difficulty
settings

Full Rating and progress system from
Rookie to Legend

10+ bowling environments

30+ bowling balls

10+ sets of pins to choose from and
unlock

Ball customisation including weight &
size.

Full spin control and shot shape
setup

Fully adjustable address position
including position and direction

Save your favourite shots and watch
video playback

Full 3D physics in full 3D
environments
